0: In recent years, scientists have made significant strides in the field of artificial intelligence. These advancements have led to the creation of sophisticated algorithms that can perform tasks previously thought to be the exclusive domain of humans. From diagnosing diseases to driving autonomous vehicles, AI is transforming industries and improving efficiency. As technology continues to evolve, the potential applications of AI seem limitless.
